thread.title: VALERIE
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by VALERIE

author: VALERIE
title: VALERIE
text: I found this company very easy to deal with from website booking to Airport pick up and return. The staff at the Red Spot counter were very friendly and new there stuff. Good advice was given and ease of rental etc. A good clean car was provided and ease of return made our whole experience excellent. Highly recommend Redspot Car Rentals and would not hesitate in using them again in the future.
